Title: Hori-mological projective duality
Abstract: © 2019 Duke University Press. All rights reserved.Kuznetsov has conjectured that Pfaffian varieties should admit noncommutative crepant resolutions which satisfy his Homological Projective Duality. We prove half the cases of this conjecture by interpreting and proving a duality of nonabelian gauged linear sigma models proposed by Hori.
